note.p: Death: The family vault in Armagh Cathedral (04 August 1799)
Career: Lived abroad; returned to Ireland and took his seat in the House of Lords (1754); Privy Councillor
Freemason, joined, 13 January 1756, Antient Lodge No 14 at Crown, Crown Court, Fleet Street, London
Honours: Earl 1763; KP 1783 (nominated one of the first fifteen KP's, invested 11 March 1783)
Memberships: FSA (1755); MRIA (President from its establishment, 1785, to his death)
The Library and Museum of Freemasonry, ;Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' (2010) page 18
